name: Tartle's Monstous Bean Evolution
description:
In Monster Beans Evolution you evolve a monster plant by feeding it humans. It all more-or-less has something to do with how I felt making games and spamming humans to play them, just a bit darker. 

This game has a long history. It started as one thing and it never got finished. Much later, I picked up the project and dusted it off and it turned into what it is now, a much different game than originally envisioned, but hopefully still fun.

It's a mobile game. get over it. But there are no in-app purchases. The money in the game is collected from the characters. The "ads" in the game are actually a story about me, the hapless developer. Weird, I know.
